abstract: Howard Greenberg brings a wealth of experience to aid in the defense of a Brooklyn man accused of kidnapping, killing and dismembering an 8-year-old boy.
snippet: Howard Greenberg brings a wealth of experience to aid in the defense of a Brooklyn man accused of kidnapping, killing and dismembering an 8-year-old boy.

headline.main: Veteran Lawyer Joins Defense Team in Leiby Kletzky Case
